subject: Marathon Running
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Markos Geneti of Ethiopia set a Los Angeles Marathon record of 2 hours 6 minutes 35 seconds in winning his debut at 26.2 miles by nearly three minutes.
snippet: Markos Geneti of Ethiopia set a Los Angeles Marathon record of 2 hours 6 minutes 35 seconds in winning his debut at 26.2 miles by nearly three minutes.
